overview: This DVD includes:  Meet The Raisins --- Meet the Raisins and share their hilarious rise to stardom from seedy honky-tonks to the top of the music charts.  Includes hit Raisin versions of "Ain't Too Proud To Beg," "Sh-Boom," "Cool Jerk,"  "Signed, Sealed, Delivered, I'm Yours," "Get a Job" and "Shotgun"  Raisins: Sold Out --- The Raisins soon find that fame is fleeting.  In desperation they sign with a slick promoter who swaps their trademark Motown sound for "trendy" Country Rap, Disco Polka and Demolition Rock.  Includes the Raisin hits "Respect," "Mr. Pitiful" and "I Heard It Through The Grapvine."
title: The California Raisins
